data.eml:eml: First record of Rhabdoblattella (Blaberidae, Epilamprinae) from China with descriptions of two new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Wang, Zhenzhen, Yang, Rong, Wang, Zongqing (2017): First record of Rhabdoblattella (Blaberidae, Epilamprinae) from China with descriptions of two new species. Zootaxa 4294 (3): 381-388, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4294.3.8
